amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in contravention of the Code of Federal Regulations by ensuring that the FAA is able to certify that aircraft flight decks are protected from intrusion even at times when pilots have to open reinforced doors for the purpose of eating, resting, or bathroom breaks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of section 121.584 of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Fitzpatrick.
